text:
Hailey Rhode Bieber ("née" Baldwin; born November 22, 1996) is an American model and television personality. She is the daughter of Stephen Baldwin and is married to Canadian singer Justin Bieber. She was born in Tuscon, Arizona.
In March 2016, Baldwin signed a contract with IMG Models high-profile New York modeling agency and in May appeared on the cover of "Marie Claire". Baldwin was also the face of Karl Lagerfeld's limited-edition clothing line available in North America entitled "Love From Paris". Baldwin also appeared in editorials for "Glamour Magazine" and "Italian Vogue".
In May 2017, she began hosting a new TBS show "Drop the Mic" with rapper Method Man, which features four celebrities facing off in a series of rap battles.
